execution_quality: The agent applied a targeted fix to address the libgcc_s.so.1 loading error, demonstrating understanding of the Guix-specific toolchain issue.

The user accepted the solution but proposed a complementary approach using Guix manifests, indicating the fix was correct but pointing toward a more systemic improvement.
